name: 5ttgen
description:
Generate a 5TT image suitable for ACT.

5ttgen acts as a 'master' script for generating a five-tissue-type (5TT) segmented tissue image suitable for use in Anatomically-Constrained Tractography (ACT). A range of different algorithms are available for completing this task. When using this script, the name of the algorithm to be used must appear as the first argument on the command-line after '5ttgen'. The subsequent compulsory arguments and options available depend on the particular algorithm being invoked.
Each algorithm available also has its own help page, including necessary references; e.g. to see the help page of the 'fsl' algorithm, type '5ttgen fsl'.
author: Robert E. Smith (robert.smith@florey.edu.au)

inputs.name: algorithm
inputs.description: Select the algorithm to be used to complete the script operation; additional details and options become available once an algorithm is nominated. Options are: freesurfer, fsl, gif, hsvs

type.name: freesurfer
type.description: Generate the 5TT image based on a FreeSurfer parcellation image

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: The input FreeSurfer parcellation image (any image containing 'aseg' in its name)

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: The output 5TT image

inputs.name: lut
inputs.description: Manually provide path to the lookup table on which the input parcellation image is based (e.g. FreeSurferColorLUT.txt)

type.name: fsl
type.description: Use FSL commands to generate the 5TT image based on a T1-weighted image

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: The input T1-weighted image

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: The output 5TT image

inputs.name: t2
inputs.description: Provide a T2-weighted image in addition to the default T1-weighted image; this will be used as a second input to FSL FAST

inputs.name: mask
inputs.description: Manually provide a brain mask, rather than deriving one in the script

inputs.name: premasked
inputs.description: Indicate that brain masking has already been applied to the input image

type.name: gif
type.description: Generate the 5TT image based on a Geodesic Information Flow (GIF) segmentation image

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: The input Geodesic Information Flow (GIF) segmentation image

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: The output 5TT image

type.name: hsvs
type.description: Generate a 5TT image based on Hybrid Surface and Volume Segmentation (HSVS), using FreeSurfer and FSL tools

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: The input FreeSurfer subject directory

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: The output 5TT image

inputs.name: template
inputs.description: Provide an image that will form the template for the generated 5TT image

inputs.name: hippocampi
inputs.description: Select method to be used for hippocampi (& amygdalae) segmentation; options are: subfields,first,aseg

inputs.name: thalami
inputs.description: Select method to be used for thalamic segmentation; options are: nuclei,first,aseg

inputs.name: white_stem
inputs.description: Classify the brainstem as white matter

inputs.name: nocrop
inputs.description: Do NOT crop the resulting 5TT image to reduce its size (keep the same dimensions as the input image)

inputs.name: sgm_amyg_hipp
inputs.description: Represent the amygdalae and hippocampi as sub-cortical grey matter in the 5TT image

inputs.name: nocleanup
inputs.description: do not delete intermediate files during script execution, and do not delete scratch directory at script completion.

inputs.name: scratch
inputs.description: manually specify the path in which to generate the scratch directory.

inputs.name: continue
inputs.description: continue the script from a previous execution; must provide the scratch directory path, and the name of the last successfully-generated file.

inputs.name: info
inputs.description: display information messages.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: display debugging messages.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: display version information and exit.
